description: Despite looking like a child, she is about Shin`ichi`s age and is the monarch of the Eldant Empire. She takes an interest in Shin`ichi after seeing how casually he speaks with her and starts visiting him on a regular basis to have him read manga for her. Petralka usually complains at Myucel out of jealousy due to her closeness with Shin`ichi and asks him to teach her the Japanese language as well.
name: Petralka Anne Eldant III
